reviewText: my kids must watch this 3x a day. they love it!
There are a lot of good ideas to save money while building a layout. These apply to most any gauge of model railroading.

Good advice on Layout building. Well documented and fun.

I'm an old man about to become young again and this video gives me a head start in that direction.

This is a good instructional disc with plenty of information on scenery and it's construction.  Since I haven't constructed any layouts previous, I ordered this disc to help, which it did.
